description: Server-Sent Events stream for conversation updates (messages, reactions, typing indicators)

main.description: Subscribe to live events (new messages, reactions, etc.) via Server-Sent Events in conversations involving the authenticated user

cursor.description: Opaque resume cursor. If provided, resume after this position.

convoId.description: Optional conversation filter (only receive events for this conversation).

messageEvent.description: Event for a newly sent message

cursor.description: Resume cursor for this event position

reactionEvent.description: Event for a reaction added or removed

cursor.description: Resume cursor for this event position

messageId.description: ID of the message that was reacted to

did.description: DID of the user who performed the reaction

typingEvent.description: Event indicating a user is typing

cursor.description: Resume cursor for this event position

isTyping.description: True if the user started typing, false if they stopped

infoEvent.description: Event carrying informational messages (heartbeat or notices)

cursor.description: Resume cursor for this event position
